title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + Welcome to the Glamorous World of Data
description: Being data-literate is essential in today's world, and journalists need to understand their rights and be prepared to fight for them. Reporting at the extremes can be legitimate journalism, and data do not come with an instruction manual. The numbers are not the story, and resources for data journalism are provided.
